com.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.container

Class CardBeanContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.container.AbstractBeanContainer
      • com.sebastiandine.cardcollectionmanager.container.CardBeanContainer

  • public class CardBeanContainer
extends AbstractBeanContainer
    This container class provides holds a list of CardBean objects and provides methods for interaction with this list.
    Author:
    Sebastian Dine

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addCardBean(CardBean card)
      This method adds a CardBean object to the internal list of CardBean objects.
      static void deleteCardBeanById(int id)
      This method deletes the CardBean element with the given 'id' from the internal list of CardBean objects.
      static CardBean getCardBeanById(int id)
      This method searches for the CardBean element with the given 'id' from the internal list of CardBean objects.
      static CardBean[] getCardBeanList()
      This method returns the internal list of CardBean objects as an array.
      static int getNextId()
      This method returns the next free ID within the CardBeanContainer.
      static void saveCardBeanList()
      This method saves the current internal list of CardBean objects to the local system.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • addCardBean

        public static void addCardBean(CardBean card)
        This method adds a CardBean object to the internal list of CardBean objects.
        Parameters:
        card - Predefined CardBean object. Attribute 'id' will be defined by this method so it does not need to be predefined.

      • getNextId

        public static int getNextId()
        This method returns the next free ID within the CardBeanContainer.
        Returns:
        Next free ID within container.

      • deleteCardBeanById

        public static void deleteCardBeanById(int id)
        This method deletes the CardBean element with the given 'id' from the internal list of CardBean objects.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the CardBean element which should be deleted from the internal list. Use CardBean.getId() to retrieve the id of a target object.

      • getCardBeanById

        public static CardBean getCardBeanById(int id)
        This method searches for the CardBean element with the given 'id' from the internal list of CardBean objects.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the CardBean element which should be returned from the internal list.
        Returns:
        CardBean element with the given ID. null, if no element with the given ID exists.

      • getCardBeanList

        public static CardBean[] getCardBeanList()
        This method returns the internal list of CardBean objects as an array.
        Returns:
        Array with all internal CardBean objects.

      • saveCardBeanList

        public static void saveCardBeanList()
        This method saves the current internal list of CardBean objects to the local system. The save destination is defined by property 'url_carddata' in config file 'config/config.properties'.
